   How Smart Phones Work
  
A smartphones  is one device that can take care of all of your handheld computing and communication needs in a single, small package. It's not so much a distinct class of products as it is a different set of standards for cell phones to live up to. This article explores what makes a cell phone a smartphones, how the idea came about and what you can do with it.Learn what makes a cell phone a smartphone.
